page.title: 06Transport by Land
page.content: { The Tresco Estate has transport for {its holiday cottages and is serviced {by Mr K.Johnson. { Matthew wrote to Mr Johnson to ask him about the trucks for the holiday cottages. Robert and Graeme talked to him. There are a lot of cottages; Dolphin House, Dolphin Cottage, Nurses,Ocean View,Beach,Green,Glen, Towns Hill,Thatch, Porth,Just Home,Sea Spray,Smugglers, Bay House,and Hilltop in our D-Block. There are 10 people working for the cottages, three on the transport. They are all dressed in a green outfit. The trucks are painted yellow and black. There are two low loading trailers,a heavy truck,a light truck,a grocery trailer,a luggage trailer,and a gardening trailer,a tractor and a bus trailer.Sometimes they take cots
